briefdescription.para: Messages that are not handled by other events and are not errors.
Error messages from the IRC server.

detaileddescription.para: summary> A Sender.PrivateNotice or Sender.PrivateMessage message was sent to someone who is away. /summary>

briefdescription.para: An Sender.Invite message was successfully sent to another user.
The user tried to change his nick but it failed.
A server keep-alive message.
Connection with the IRC server is open and registered.
This connection is about to be closed.
This connection has been closed.
A Notice type message was sent to a channel.
A private Notice type message was sent to the user.
Someone has joined a channel.
A public message was sent to a channel.
An action message was sent to a channel.
A private action message was sent to the user.
A user changed his nickname.
A private message was sent to the user.
A channel's topic has changed.
The response to a Sender.RequestTopic command.
Someone has left a channel.
Someone has quit IRC.
The user has been invited to a channel.
Someone has been kicked from a channel.
The response to a Sender.Names request.
The response to a Sender.List request.
The response to a Sender.Ison request.
The response to a Sender.Who request.
The response to a Sender.Whois request.
The response to a Sender.Whowas request.
Someone's user mode has changed.
The response to a Sender.RequestUserModes command for this user.
The response to a Sender.RequestChannelModes command.
A channel's mode has changed.
Response to a Sender.RequestChannelList command.
The response to a Sender.Version request.
A server's 'Message of the Day'.
The response to a Sender.Time request.
The response to an Sender.Info request.
The response to an Sender.Admin request.
The response to a Sender.Lusers request.
The response to a Sender.Links request.
The response to a Sender.Stats request.
A User has been disconnected via a Kill message.
Table to hold WhoIsInfos while they are being created. The key is the nick and the value if the WhoisInfo struct.
Create an instance ready to parse incoming messages.
Warn listeners that we are about to close this connection.
Tell listeners that this connection is closed.
Tell listeners that an error has been encountered.
Parse the message and call the callback methods on the listeners.

parameterdescription.para: The text received from the IRC server

briefdescription.para: Find the correct WhoIs object based on the nick name.
Turn an array of strings back into a single string.
Strip off the trailing CTCP quote.
This class parses messages received from the IRC server and raises the appropriate event.
